pullRequest.title: Feature/issue155 vert horiz arrangements
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description of the Change
Add 'Horzonatal' and 'Vertiacal' arrangement options to Arrange toolbar and menu.
Alternate Designs
Nil
Why Should This Be In Core?
Provide users alternates to arrange items quickly - as requested by end user in associated ticket.
Benefits
See above
Possible Drawbacks
Nil
Verification Process

Create a graph copntaining multiple nodes
From Arrange menu, arrange as grid
From Arrange menu, arrange as horizontal line
From Arrange menu, arrange as vertical line
From Arrange toolbar, arrange as grid
From Arrange toolbar, arrange as horizontal line
From Arrange toolbar, arrange as vertical line

Applicable Issues

commit.message: Add horizontal and vertical arrangement options
force order of new actions in menu/toolbar.

nodes.bodyText:
Great work @serpens24.
Can you please use the GridChoice enums instead of the String?
Can you please use the GridChoice enums instead of the String?

commit.message: Added entry to whats new and removed magic strings.

nodes.bodyText: Since this is one of our most used arrangements, rather than change it i'd suggest making an ArrangeInGridGeneralAction to run alongside it.
